m:Text.text: We are excited to invite you to participate in our Request for Quotation (RFQ) event. This is your opportunity to submit competitive quotes for the materials and services required by Airdit. We value your expertise and look forward to receiving your proposal.

Below you will find the list of materials or services for which we are requesting quotations. These items are essential to our ongoing operations, and we trust your company will provide the most competitive and accurate pricing. You can view the material descriptions, quantities, and delivery requirements for each item in the list. Before proceeding, please ensure you have reviewed the specifications carefully to offer the best quote.
Before you can proceed with submitting your quotation, please complete the following pre-requisites. This step ensures that all the necessary information is provided and compliant with our RFQ terms.
Please upload the following documents to proceed with your quotation submission

m:MessageStrip.text: Supported Attachment Types: txt, pdf, xlsx, csv. Attachment Size up to 3 MB
Supported Attachment Types: txt, pdf, xlsx, csv. Attachment Size up to 1 MB

m:Text.text: Please review all your responses before final submission.

We are pleased to announce that, after a thorough and comprehensive evaluation process, Airdit Software Services has awarded the quotation for RFQ No: {oHeaderModel>/results/0/RfqNumber} to your esteemed company.
Your proposal stood out due to its alignment with our expectations, exceptional quality, and competitive pricing.
This milestone marks the beginning of a fruitful partnership, and we are excited to move forward with your services in fulfilling this important project.
At Airdit Software Services, we value collaboration, transparency, and mutual growth, and we look forward to a successful partnership.
We are confident that together, we will achieve excellence and deliver outstanding results.
Thank you once again for your commitment. We are excited to embark on this journey with you.
After careful consideration, we regret to inform you that your quotation for RFQ No: {oHeaderModel>/results/0/RfqNumber} has not been selected for this project.
While we truly value the effort and time you invested in preparing your proposal,
We appreciate your participation and encourage you to continue engaging with us for future opportunities.
We hope to collaborate on upcoming projects and look forward to your continued involvement.
If you would like to receive feedback or further clarification regarding this decision,
please do not hesitate to reach out. We are happy to assist and provide any insights.
Thank you once again for your time and effort.
